Miscaa is an online platform dedicated to match lenders and borrowers. It works as a subscription based digital loan aggregator focused on transparency and one-to-one communication between lenders and borrowers. 
Lenders can be any interested party with lending capital. Banks, NBFCs, Finance companies, Private and Individual lenders. 
 
Borrowers can be anyone in need of capital, which he/ she can return with interest at a later date. 


To explain the working mechanism of Miscaa in a better light, it is better to employ an example, Suppose in Delhi there are hundred people in need of loan, they sign into our platform for FREE. We create a database of these 100 borrowers in Delhi with their basic financially relevant information. Similarly let us suppose there are in total 30 lenders present in Delhi. They all want credible borrowers to boost their company/individual financials. We give these lenders the same information of 100 borrowers we gathered on a monthly subscription basis. These lenders can show interest to the borrowers as per their criteria. Afterwards, the borrower can either accept or reject the interest shown by the lenders.
